Description

[EuroPython 2024 ‚Äî Forum Hall on 2024-07-11]

Lightning talks Thursday

https://ep2024.europython.eu/session/lightning-talks-thursday

Enjoy Thursdays's lightning talks. Short talks about everything by everyone. Hosted by Velda Kiara and Angel Ramboi:

00:00 Welcome to Thursday's Lightning Talks 00:31 Community Conference / Events Announcements & Celebration! 17:55 What to expect at the social event ‚Äî Mois√©s Guimar√£es 24:50 AutoQuizzer: Can you beat an LLM in a pub quiz? ‚Äî Bilge Yucel 29:38 Launching Crawlee for Python: Special beta version for EuroPython ‚Äî Saurav Jain 32:33 Should Python adopt CalVer? üóì ‚Äî Hugo van Kemenade 37:30 F**k it ‚Äî S√©bastien Crocquevieille 40:28 Work on sqrt(3) and Pitagora's Theorem ‚Äî Riccardo Polli 44:24 Present-ception: A presentation about presentations ‚Äî Siddharth Gupta
